arts.ttl: Aaron Lewis nets late winner for Mansfield against Shrewsbury
arts.sum: Leo Castledine had given Shrews an early lead.

arts.ttl: Paul Hurst happy to have Shrewsbury Town selection headaches
arts.sum: And Hurst said that is something he understands but there will always be good reasons for the selections he makes. But from a squad fitness point of view, Shrewsbury find themselves in a relatively healthy position.

arts.ttl: Paul Hurst: Tommi O'Reilly is keen to learn at Shrewsbury Town
arts.sum: And when asked about where he sees O'Reilly fitting in, Hurst said he does feel there is a player who is keen to improve. And the Town boss says he wants to help O'Reilly improve as a player during his loan spell in Shropshire saying they have had a good relationship from the off.

arts.ttl: Preview: Mansfield Town vs. Shrewsbury Town - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's League One clash between Mansfield Town and Shrewsbury Town, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
